name: CROSSWIND (Zanji3w Games)
description:
CROSS WIND Is a In Development game where you play as heIDI

A COLLECTOR OF THE SKY HER JOB IS TO CATCH COLLECTABLES TO COMPLETE HER MISION

YOU HAVE TO AVOID MANY THINGS WHILE COLLECTING STUFF

LIKE ROCKETS BALLOONS THAT GIVE POWER - UP'S

AND SURVIVE EACH WAVE SEE HOW FAR YOU CAN GO!

(this is subject to change as this game is still in development)

there is no title screen yet...

we just want to see players experience this game and see your opinions ( :

Remember this game is in Alpha

check out our website:https://crosswindgame.my.canva.site/
